nodes.text: TX-840 was a stormtrooper who served the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War.

In about 0 ABY, TX-840 was among a group of Imperials that escorted General Sebastian Parnell to the Deathblock, a prison block located on the planet Tol Ado. On arrival at the Deathblock, the Imperials noticed that some of the facility's guards had been killed, so Parnell ordered TX-840 to defend the position.
TX-840 was created by Troy Denning and appeared in one of the role-playing strands of the 1990 West End Games role-playing supplement Jedi's Honor.
